RumorFact.Text: Two Nomai named Pye and Idaea attempted to warp into the Deep Storm Station through a warp tower on Ash Twin, but warped to Statue Island instead.
Unable to reach their destination, Pye and Idaea decided to use the return warp to travel back to the warp tower on Ash Twin and await assistance.
A warp tower on Ash Twin in the shape of a funnel. The entrance is blocked off by a patch of ghost matter.

ExploreFact.Text: Two Nomai named Pye and Idaea narrowly avoided an argument about their views on the Sun Station while waiting for sand to recede from the warp tower. Idaea described a safety test which they hoped would give them the confidence to follow in their ambitions.
A Nomai named Poke arrived on Ash Twin to assist Idaea and Poke. She chided them for failing to read Cassava's instructions to reach the Deep Storm Station.
